channel.title: Rules For The Web Design Section!
channel.description:
[b]Here are what i think should be the rules of this section.[/b] [hr] [b]1.[/b] [i](a)[/i] No Spamming |These are the rules for all sections [i](b)[/i] No Flaming! | If you do not follow them you will get reported/punished!
[b]2.[/b] If you are requesting a web desginer please use this layout [code] [b]Title Of Website:[/b][i]<-- Self Explaintary[/i] [b]Type Of Website:[/b][i]Here is were you request the type of website, (EG Fun,Games,Fourm)[/i] [b]What i want it to be coded in[/b][i]Here is were you want the website to be coded in (HTML,PHP,WSS,ect[/i] [b]Features of the website[/b]
[ul][li]Here[/li] [li]You [/li] [li]Will [/li] [li]List [/li] [li]What [/li] [li]Features [/li] [li]you want [/li] [li]it to [/li] [li]have![/li][/ul]
[/code]
[b]3.[/b] [i](a)[/i]NEVER POST SOMEONE ELSES WEBSITE CLAIMING ITS YOURS! ^^ It is just plainly stuiped [i](b) [/i] Never Post any compyright matiral claiming it is yours! ^^ Also stuiped & Against the law!
[b]4.[/b] Respect other peoples ideas..... its a nice thing to do (refering to:[b]1.b[/b])
[b]5.[/b] Have fun creating really awesome websites.....
[hr] [b]Anyway thats my idea of what the Rules should be like.
-Wonderguy6[/b]

item.title: Rules For The Web Design Section!
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

Here are what i think should be the rules of this section.
[hr]
1.
i[/i] No Spamming |These are the rules for all sections
i[/i] No Flaming! | If you do not follow them you will get reported/punished!

2.
If you are requesting a web desginer please use this layout

[b]Title Of Website:[/b][i]<-- Self Explaintary[/i]
[b]Type Of Website:[/b][i]Here is were you request the type of website, (EG Fun,Games,Fourm)[/i]
[b]What i want it to be coded in[/b][i]Here is were you want the website to be coded in (HTML,PHP,WSS,ect[/i]
[b]Features of the website[/b]

[ul][li]Here[/li]
[li]You [/li]
[li]Will [/li] 
[li]List [/li]
[li]What [/li]
[li]Features [/li] 
[li]you want [/li]
[li]it to [/li]
[li]have![/li][/ul]

3.
i[/i]NEVER POST SOMEONE ELSES WEBSITE CLAIMING ITS YOURS!
^^ It is just plainly stuiped
i [/i] Never Post any compyright matiral claiming it is yours!
^^ Also stuiped & Against the law!

4.
Respect other peoples ideas…
its a nice thing to do (refering to:1.b)

5.
Have fun creating really awesome websites…

[hr]
[b]Anyway thats my idea of what the Rules should be like.

-Wonderguy6[/b]

Read full topic
